sign-in.title: Sign in to GitHub Copilot
html: It has been copied to your clipboard. Please open the following link in your browser
and paste the code to sign in:
Press OK after you have completed the verification.

sign-in-request-failed.title: GitHub Copilot sign-in request failed
html: Could not send the sign-in request to GitHub Copilot.
This may be due to a network issue. Please check your internet connection and try again.

signed-in.title: Signed in to Copilot
html: You have successfully signed in to Copilot.

sign-in-verification-failed.title: GitHub Copilot sign-in verification failed
html: Failed to complete the sign-in process for GitHub Copilot.
Please ensure that you have finished the verification in your browser before clicking OK.
If the issue persists, check your internet connection and try again.

warn-nodejs-above-20-required-for-typora.title: Node.js ≥ 20 is required to run this plugin under Typora ≥ 1.10
